addr: 1125 N McCadden Pl. Los Angeles, CA 90038
title: Adobe Photoshop CC Level 1 & 2 - Digital Image Editing Like The Pros
desc: Create incredible images using the world?s best digital imaging software. Learn how the professionals use these tools for retouching, compositing, 3D design and editing down to the pixel level. Taught in our  newly updated computer classroom on PC?s and Mac?s, ?this course teaches beginners, step-by-step, how to create cutting-edge graphics and special effects using this powerful professional software. It?s the app for transforming your images into anything you can imagine.By the end of this course, you will be thoroughly familiar with the tools, capabilities and all?fundamental skills necessary to take full advantage of this powerful software program. PC's and Mac computer are provided. Student's may bring their own Wi-Fi enabled laptop computers (PC or MAC)?with Adobe Photoshop CS5 or higher pre-installed.?For student?s who don?t own an installation of Adobe Photoshop, this course includes instruction for using GIMP, a free, shareware alternative to Photoshop. ? Instructor:  Dali Sadhana Level 1: Thurs., Mar. 3 & 10 Level 2: Thurs., Mar. 17 & 24 Meeting time: 7 - 9:30 p.m.
